tagline: Secure Knowledge Systems for the AI Era

hero.title: Building and Protecting Your Institutional Intelligence
hero.subtitle: We secure knowledge systems by design—delivering solutions that capture, reason, and act on institutional knowledge while protecting against prompt injection, model manipulation, and knowledge leaks.

value_props.title: Capture & Model
value_props.desc: Extract, structure and manage the knowledge your organisation holds—data, rules, domain expertise, ontologies.

value_props.title: Reason & Act
value_props.desc: Apply inference, hybrid logic, and AI to translate knowledge into decisions and actions.

value_props.title: Secure & Govern
value_props.desc: Security by design—from identity to audit, from prompt to policy. Your knowledge systems remain safe, reliable and compliant.

value_props.title: Operate & Evolve
value_props.desc: Maintain, monitor and scale your knowledge-systems landscape as new threats and requirements emerge.

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.description: Modern organisations deploy knowledge-based systems to power everything from decision-support to generative-AI assistants. But along with that power come entirely new risk surfaces:
risks: Hidden knowledge leaks and inference attacks
Lack of audit trails, governance and policy control in AI flows

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.subtitle: We secure knowledge systems by focusing on four pillars

pillars.name: Identity & Access
pillars.description: Who or what is interacting with your knowledge system? We apply strong identity, workload security and authentication to every agent and model.

pillars.name: Policy & Enforcement
pillars.description: Define what knowledge can flow, what decisions may be made, and which outputs are allowed. We deliver rule-driven filtering, sanitisation and controls.

pillars.name: Monitoring & Audit
pillars.description: Every interaction, prompt, decision and inference is logged, analysed and governed. You get visibility and accountability.

pillars.name: Response & Resilience
pillars.description: When threats or anomalies arise—model misuse, adversarial injection, internal leakage—we help you respond and recover.

benefits.title: Why It Matters
benefits.subtitle: By securing your knowledge systems, you reduce the risk of:
list: Non-compliance, reputational damage or audit failures

specialisation.title: Our Specialisation
specialisation.subtitle: We build and secure knowledge systems that:
list: Decouple knowledge capture from inference execution
Scale across multilingual and multi-domain environments
Are built with security by design, logging by default, and governance at every layer
